org.jgrapes.portal

Class AbstractPortlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentVertex
      • org.jgrapes.core.Component
        • org.jgrapes.portal.AbstractPortlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<ComponentType>, Channel, ComponentType, Eligible, Manager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeMarkerPortlet

    public abstract class AbstractPortlet
extends Component

    Provides a base class for implementing portlet components.

      • onResourceRequest

        @Handler
public void onResourceRequest(PortletResourceRequest event,
                                       IOSubchannel channel)

        A default handler for resource requests. Searches for a file with the requested URI in the portlets class path.

        Parameters:
        event - the resource request event
        channel - the channel that the request was recived on

      • resourceSupplier

        protected Function<Locale,ResourceBundle> resourceSupplier()

        Provides a supplier for a resource bundle for localization. The default implementation looks up a bundle using the package name plus “l10n” as base name.

        Returns:
        the supplier
